Package org.fluentjava.closures

Package with closure utilities.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Closure Approximation of the concept of closure on Java, abstracting a function definition.
ClosureCoercion Converts Objects do Closures, or throws ClosureCoercionException if can't.
ClosureOfAMethod Wraps around an object instance and a method of its class.
ClosureOfAMethodName Whenever this ClosureOfAMethodName.call(Object...) is invoked, it reflectively invokes the ClosureOfAMethodName.methodName into the first argument passed, passing the rest of the arguments to the actual method.
InvocationHandlerAdapter Adapts a closure to a Invocation Handler.
Predicate A predicate is a Closure that always returns a boolean (primitive).
PredicateAdapter Adapts a Closure to a Predicate.
PriviligedClosureOfAMethodName Like ClosureOfAMethodName, but on a specific target, and calls protected and private methods as well.
 

Exception Summary
ClosureCoercionException Indicates an Object could not be converted to a Closure.
 

Package org.fluentjava.closures Description

Package with closure utilities.
